snippet.title: 0 A D  Alpha 20 Timosthenes Trailer
snippet.description:
0 A.D. Alpha 20 is out now. New features include plenty of new maps, new technologies to improve your civilization, a host of improvements to the observer mode and replay mode, and many smaller changes. And not to be forgotten there now is support for cinematic camera paths, which are used in this video to highlight some of the new maps.

Visit https://play0ad.com to learn more about this free, open-source game of ancient warfare, and to download Alpha 20.
